Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: This part of the road runs through small hills and valleys.
Room.LongDescription: East of here is the infamous Timarask Valley, known as a dangerous place along the great Lyanden Road. Overhead, occasional rain showers drift from the valley to the east. Another valley which is off the road converges here with Timarask Valley. A sign indicates it is the Valley of Timeron.
